resources.string:
In this game you will have 5 chances to guess my random number, which is between 1 and 100. 

After each guess, I will let you know if your guess is higher or lower than my random number.

Good Luck!
Your number was lower than mine. Please try again.
Your number was higher than mine. Please try again.
Invalid guess. Please try again, with a number between 1 and 100.
You have run out of guesses. Would you like to play again?
Congratulations! You have guessed my number correctly!
